channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Migration, Backup, Staging – WPvivid

item.title: CVE-2022-2863|2024-08-03T00:52:58.992Z -- unknown -- migration%2C%20backup%2C%20staging%20%E2%80%93%20wpvivid
item.description: The Migration, Backup, Staging WordPress plugin before 0.9.76 does not sanitise and validate a parameter before using it to read the content of a file, allowing high privilege users to read any file from the web server via a Traversal attack
